OK so after a few days playing around with this issue on my old laptop (funny cause it sucks so bad)...I managed to fix this:

1. I changed the power plan options...make sure you run at full performance...and go to advanced options and set whatever you think is best performance.
2. During the game (while in loading screen) press ALT+ TAB and open task manager - right click LOL and click on properties - go to compatibility and set to run as Windows 7....assuming you got WIN 8 or 10.

That fixed it for me! Now I run with vertical Sync and antialising on my old laptop :))
How i can do a log reader?The problems is that on my laptop the game working good...but i want to play on PC
